alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 12:11PM CST until January 27 at 5:39AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Neches River Near Town Bluff Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 545 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...No flooding is currently forecast. * WHERE...Neches River near Town Bluff. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 67.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady below flood stage at 67.6 feet. - Flood stage is 68.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Neches River Town Bluff 68.0 67.4 Fri 11 am CS 67.6 67.6 67.6 &&
